meanings.sent1: The math problem was integrable, so I could solve it easily.
meanings.sent2: The data was integrable into the existing system without any issues.
meanings.sent3: The recipe was integrable with the new ingredients I bought.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were integrable with mine, creating a harmonious collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were integrable, fitting perfectly together.

meanings.definition: Able to be combined or unified.
meanings.sent1: The different colors were integrable, creating a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The diverse opinions were integrable into a cohesive decision.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched socks were surprisingly integrable in his quirky outfit.
meanings.sent4: Their voices were integrable, blending seamlessly in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The various melodies were integrable, forming a symphony of sound.

meanings.sent1: The new software was integrable with the existing programs.
meanings.sent2: The additional features were integrable into the current design.
meanings.sent3: The fresh ideas were integrable, enhancing the project.
meanings.sent4: The new team member was integrable, bringing valuable skills.
meanings.sent5: The updated policy was integrable, improving efficiency.
